cursorMovement.title: Markørbevægelser

commands.w: hop frem til starten af et ord
commands.W: hop frem til starten af et ord (ord kan indeholde tegnsætning)
commands.e: hop frem til slutningen af et ord
commands.E: hop frem til slutningen af et ord (ord kan indeholde tegnsætning)
commands.b: hop tilbage til starten af et ord
commands.B: hop tilbage til starten af et ord (ord kan indeholde tegnsætning)
commands.ge: hop tilbage til slutningen af et ord
commands.gE: hop tilbage til slutningen af et ord (ord kan indeholde tegnsætning)
commands.caret: hop til det første ikke-blanke tegn på linjen
commands.g_: hop til det sidste ikke-blanke tegn på linjen
commands.gg: gå til den første linje i dokumentet
commands.G: gå til sidste linje i dokumentet
commands.fx: hop til næste forekomst af tegnet x
commands.tx: hop til før næste forekomst af tegnet x
commands.Fx: hop til forrige forekomst af tegnet x
commands.Tx: hop til efter forrige forekomst af tegnet x
commands.semicolon: gentag sidste f-, t-, F- eller T-bevægelse
commands.comma: gentag sidste f-, t-, F- eller T-bevægelse, baglæns
commands.closeCurlyBrace: hop til næste afsnit (eller funktion/blok, når du redigerer kode)
commands.openCurlyBrace: hop til forrige afsnit (eller funktion/blok, når du redigerer kode)
commands.topCursor: positioner markøren i toppen af skærmen
commands.bottomCursor: positioner markøren i bunden af skærmen
commands.CtrlPluse: flyt skærmen én linje ned (uden at flytte markøren)
commands.CtrlPlusy: flyt skærmen op en linje (uden at flytte markøren)
commands.percent: flyt til matchende tegn (standard understøttede par: '()', '{}', '[]' - brug :h matchpairs i vim for mere information)

cursorMovement.tip: For-præfiks en markørbevægelseskommando med et tal for at gentage den. For eksempel flytter <kbd>4j</kbd> fire linjer ned.

commands.o: indsæt (tilføj) en ny linje under nuværende linje
commands.O: indsæt (tilføj) en ny linje over nuværende linje
commands.ea: indsæt (tilføj) efter sidste tegn i ordet
commands.ctrlPlush: delete the character before the cursor during insert mode
commands.ctrlPlusw: delete word before the cursor during insert mode
commands.ctrlPlusj: add a line break at the cursor position during insert mode
commands.ctrlPlust: indent (move right) line one shiftwidth during insert mode
commands.ctrlPlusd: de-indent (move left) line one shiftwidth during insert mode
commands.ctrlPlusn: insert (auto-complete) next match before the cursor during insert mode
commands.ctrlPlusp: insert (auto-complete) previous match before the cursor during insert mode
commands.ctrlPlusrx: insert the contents of register x
commands.ctrlPlusox: Temporarily enter normal mode to issue one normal-mode command x.
commands.s: slet karakter under markøren og gå ind i indsætningsmodus
commands.S: slet linje og gå ind i indsætningsmodus
commands.Cx: slet fra markøren til slutningen af linjen og gå ind i indsætningsmodus
commands.c: slet fra markøren til starten af linjen og gå ind i indsætningsmodus
commands.Cc: slet hele linjen og gå ind i indsætningsmodus
commands.C: slet fra markøren til slutningen af linjen og gå ind i indsætningsmodus
commands.gr: erstat karakter, men ikke træk i en tabulator eller indsæt ekstra mellemrum
commands.R: erstat flere tegn fra markøren og til højre

commands.yw: kopier tegnene i ordet fra markørpositionen til begyndelsen af det næste ord
commands.yaw: kopier ordet under markøren og mellemrummet efter eller før det
commands.gp: indsæt klippepladen efter markøren og lad markøren stå efter den nye tekst
commands.gP: indsæt før markøren og lad markøren stå efter den nye tekst
commands.dw: slet (klip ud) tegnene i ordet fra markørpositionen til begyndelsen af det næste ord
commands.daw: slet (klip ud) ord under markøren og mellemrummet efter eller før det
commands.gPatternD: slet alle linjer, der indeholder mønsteret
commands.gNotPatternD: slet alle linjer, der ikke indeholder mønsteret

tip1.title: Du kan også bruge følgende tegn til at angive rækkevidden:

commands.dotCommaDollarD: Fra den nuværende linje til slutningen af filen
commands.dotCommaOneD: Fra den nuværende linje til begyndelsen af filen
commands.tenCommaDollarD: Fra den 10. linje til begyndelsen af filen

commands.greaterThanGreaterThan: indryk (flyt til højre) linje én indrykningsbredde
commands.lessThanLessThan: fjern indryk (flyt til venstre) linje én indrykningsbredde
commands.greaterThanPercent: indryk en blok med () eller {} (markør på parentes)
commands.=Percent: genindryk en blok med () eller {} (markør på parentes)
commands.closeSquarep: indsæt og juster indryk til den aktuelle linje
commands.=Procent: genindryk en blok med () eller {} (markør på parentes)
commands.lessThanPercent: fjern indryk af en blok med () eller {} (markør på parentes)

commands.colonwsudo: skriv den aktuelle fil med sudo
commands.colonq: afslut (mislykkes hvis der er ikke-gemte ændringer)
commands.colonwqa: skriv (gem) og afslut i alle faneblade

commands.backslashVpattern: 'meget magisk' mønster: ikke-alfanumeriske tegn tolkes som specielle regex-symboler (ingen escaping nødvendig)
commands.colonPercentForwardSlashOldForwardSlashN: erstat alle gamle med nye i hele filen
erstat alle gamle med nye i hele filen med bekræftelser

commands.colonvimgrep: søg efter mønster i flere filer

commands.R: replace more than one character, until <kbd>ESC</kbd> is pressed.
commands.J: join line below to the current one with one space in between
commands.gJ: join line below to the current one without space in between
commands.gu: change to lowercase up to motion
commands.gU: change to uppercase up to motion
commands.cDollar: change (replace) to the end of the line
commands.cw: change (replace) to the end of the word
commands.S: delete line and substitute text (same as cc)

markingText.title: Marking text (visual mode)

commands.v: start visual mode, mark lines, then do a command (like y-yank)
commands.o: move to other end of marked area
commands.O: move to other corner of block

markingText.tip1: Instead of <kbd>b</kbd> or <kbd>B</kbd> one can also use <kbd>(</kbd> or <kbd>{</kbd> respectively.

registers.title: Registers

commands.quotePlusy: yank into the system clipboard register
commands.quotePlusp: paste from the system clipboard register

registers.tip1: Registers are being stored in ~/.viminfo, and will be loaded again on next restart of vim.

tip2.title: Special registers:
tip2.quote: unnamed register, last delete or yank
tip2.minus: last small (less than a line) delete

marks.title: Marks and positions

commands.currentPositionA: set current position for mark A
commands.jumpPositionA: jump to position of mark A
commands.yankToMarkA: yank text to position of mark A
commands.backtick0: go to the position where Vim was previously exited
commands.backtickQuote: go to the position when last editing this file
commands.backtickDot: go to the position of the last change in this file
commands.backtickBacktick: go to the position before the last jump
commands.ctrlPlusi: go to newer position in jump list
commands.ctrlPluso: go to older position in jump list
commands.gcomma: go to newer position in change list
commands.gsemicolon: go to older position in change list
commands.ctrlPlusCloseSquare: jump to the tag under cursor

marks.tip1: To jump to a mark you can either use a backtick (<kbd>`</kbd>) or an apostrophe (<kbd>'</kbd>). Using an apostrophe jumps to the beginning (first non-blank) of the line holding the mark.

global.title: Global

commands.K: open man page for word under the cursor

global.tip1: Run <kbd>vimtutor</kbd> in a terminal to learn the first Vim commands.

commands.yw: yank (copy) the characters of the word from the cursor position to the start of the next word
commands.yaw: yank (copy) word under the cursor and the space after or before it
commands.gp: put (paste) the clipboard after cursor and leave cursor after the new text
commands.gP: put (paste) before cursor and leave cursor after the new text
commands.dw: delete (cut) the characters of the word from the cursor position to the start of the next word
commands.daw: delete (cut) word under the cursor and the space after or before it
commands.dDollar: delete (cut) to the end of the line
commands.gNotPatternD: delete all lines not containing pattern

tip1.title: You can also use the following characters to specify the range:

commands.dotCommaDollarD: Fra den nuværende linje til slutningen af filen
commands.dotCommaOneD: Fra den nuværende linje til begyndelsen af filen
commands.tenCommaOneD: Fra den 10. linje til begyndelsen af filen

commands.greaterThanPercent: indent a block with () or {} (cursor on brace)
commands.=Percent: re-indent a block with () or {} (cursor on brace)
commands.closeSquarep: paste and adjust indent to current line
commands.lessThanPercent: de-indent a block with () or {} (cursor on brace)

commands.colonw: write (save) the file, but don't exit
commands.colonwsudo: write out the current file using sudo
commands.colonq: quit (fails if there are unsaved changes)
commands.colonqbang: quit and throw away unsaved changes
commands.colonwqa: write (save) and quit on all tabs

commands.backslashVpattern: 'very magic' pattern: non-alphanumeric characters are interpreted as special regex symbols (no escaping needed)
commands.colonPercentForwardSlashOldForwardSlashN: replace all old with new throughout file
replace all old with new throughout file with confirmations

commands.colonvimgrep: search for pattern in multiple files
commands.coloncopen: open a window containing the list of matches

commands.colone: edit a file in a new buffer
commands.colonbnumber: go to a buffer by index #
commands.colonbfile: go to a buffer by file
commands.colonsp: open a file in a new buffer and split window
commands.colonvsp: open a file in a new buffer and vertically split window
commands.colonvertba: edit all buffers as vertical windows
commands.ctrlPluswx: exchange current window with next one
commands.ctrlPlusw=: make all windows equal height & width
commands.ctrlPluswh: move cursor to the left window (vertical split)
commands.ctrlPluswl: move cursor to the right window (vertical split)
commands.ctrlPluswj: move cursor to the window below (horizontal split)
commands.ctrlPluswk: move cursor to the window above (horizontal split)
commands.ctrlPluswH: make current window full height at far left (leftmost vertical window)
commands.ctrlPluswL: make current window full height at far right (rightmost vertical window)
commands.ctrlPluswJ: make current window full width at the very bottom (bottommost horizontal window)
commands.ctrlPluswK: make current window full width at the very top (topmost horizontal window)

commands.colonTabNew: open a file in a new tab
commands.ctrlPluswT: move the current split window into its own tab
commands.colontabmove: move current tab to the #th position (indexed from 0)
commands.colontabc: close the current tab and all its windows
commands.colontabo: close all tabs except for the current one
commands.colontabdo: run the command on all tabs (e.g. :tabdo q - closes all opened tabs)

diff.title: Diff

commands.zf: manually define a fold up to motion
commands.zr: reduce (open) all folds by one level
commands.zm: fold more (close) all folds by one level
commands.closeSquarec: jump to start of next change
commands.openSquarec: jump to start of previous change
commands.colonDiffthis: make current window part of diff
commands.colonDiffoff: switch off diff mode for current window

diff.tip1: The commands for folding (e.g. <kbd>za</kbd>) operate on one level. To operate on all levels, use uppercase letters (e.g. <kbd>zA</kbd>).
diff.tip2: To view the differences of files, one can directly start Vim in diff mode by running <kbd>vimdiff</kbd> in a terminal. One can even set this as <kbd>git difftool</kbd>.
